Lock.description: Prevents a robbery attempt. This item will still be used even if the robber would've paid you

Lock Pick.description: 75% to pick a lock. In the case that you picked the lock, you do not lose the lock pick

Precognition.description: Allows you to see the future! For the next crash game, you will automatically cash out just before the game crashes

Donation.description: Donate money to help the poor. Exchanges Credits into 1 Unity (Limited stock)
